name: PlayStation Developer's Demo CD
overview: This isn't your average CD It's a double topped, fully loaded audio and interactive experience for your CD Player now and for your new Sony PlayStation when you pick it up on 9/9/95. Give your friends PlayStation envy when you tell them you're the first to own a PlayStation and stick it to them again when you tell them about this specialized CD - which up to now has only been available to official PlayStation game developers. Check out the development features of the PlayStation yourself. Experiment with 3-D graphic displays, real-time action, movie quality special effects and CD quality sounds and music featuring new tracks from these great Sony bands! The The, Dog, Korn, Mother May I and Dandelion! See and hear for yourself the raw power behind the new video game system that's gonna give you the most graphically realistic experiences you've ever imagined!
